title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Argentina 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, containing a total of 41 data points.
Overall GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2001 and 2002.
Maximum GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, about 14895.32 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, of value 2779.87 was reported at Year 1989
